sen.j: 一条天皇中宮藤原彰子に仕えた上臈女房で、のち彰子所生の後一条天皇の乳母となった。
sen.e: She was Joro Nyobo (high rank lady servant in the Imperial Court) serving FUJIWARA no Shoshi, the second consort of the Emperor Ichijo, and became a wet nurse of Emperor Goichijo after Shoshi gave a birth.

sen.j: 彰子とは父親同士が兄弟の従姉妹にあたる。

sen.j: 女房名は宰相の君、弁の宰相の君、讃岐の宰相の君、美作三位などと称した。
sen.e: Hoshi (Toyoko)'s names as a court lady referred to Saisho no kimi, Ben no Saisho no kimi, Sanuki no Saisho no kimi, Mimasaka no sanmi and so on.

sen.j: 紫式部の親しい同僚の一人で『紫式部日記』にもたびたび登場、「絵に描いた姫君のよう」などと言われその美しさを賞賛されている。
sen.e: Hoshi (Toyoko) was one of Shikibu MURASAKI's close associates and was praised for her beauty described as "looks like a Himegimi (daughter of a person of high rank) in a picture", occasionally appearing in "Murasakishikibu nikki" (Diary of Lady Murasaki Shikibu).
